directions: Place the cream cheese in the bowl of a food processor; pulse the cream cheese while adding the Guinness and Worcestershire sauce. Add the garlic and Dubliner cheese; process until smooth. Spoon the mixture into a serving bowl; cover. Chill in refrigerator overnight or 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package Dubliner Irish cheese, shredded
title: Dubliner and Guinness®
